content.question: Which of the following is most likely to be a beneficial effect of using MeeReader?

choices.label: Users may have a reduced risk of the application being used in unintended ways.
Users may have a reduced risk of their biometric data being misused.
Users with limited Internet access may be able to more easily obtain books and articles.
Users with visual impairments may be able to more easily read or listen to books and articles.

content.answer: Users with visual impairments may be able to more easily read or listen to books and articles.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
